A brief guide to the *Bay Area Baker’s Dozen Wild Edibles*, free with [a tax-deductible donation](http://give.berkeley.edu/BOSF) of $15 or more (in the “special instructions” area of the [donation](http://give.berkeley.edu/BOSF) checkout, please tell us to send a copy).

To help improve food security in light of Covid-19, we offer a low-resolution version here. **Please do not rely on it to identify edible plants definitively! Many edible plants have toxic look-alikes.**
